response.overview: The film follows Ambrogio Beccaria in the present, inside a shipyard where control, precision, and routine define his daily work as a skipper. As he prepares his boat alongside his team, traces of a past season, a defeat, and an accident quietly resurface. The film gradually drifts from the concrete reality of technical labor into a more intimate and nocturnal dimension. Through fragments of memory, archival materials, and abstract imagery, it explores the fragile boundary between control and vulnerability, wakefulness and dream.
response.title: Night Shift

results.name: Night Shift - Bande annonce - Sailorz Film Festival 2026
